name: Disable-EdgeTelemetry
commandPattern: New-Item -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge' -Force | Out-Null; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge' -Name 'MetricsReportingEnabled' -Type DWord -Value 0; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge' -Name 'SendSiteInfoToImproveServices' -Type DWord -Value 0
